Key Match Events: Klaus Gjasula scored an own goal giving Croatia the lead

Albania managed to equalize despite being outplayed in the first half
Croatia manager Zlatko Dalic made significant changes at halftime to improve the team's performance
Albania manager Sylvinho praised the team's resilience and effort
